Generation V.Black: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
Generation V.White: It administers sharp, powerful pecks with its bill. It whips its long neck to deliver forceful repeated strikes.
Generation V.Black 2: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
Generation V.White 2: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.

Generation VI.X: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
Generation VI.Y: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.
Generation VI.Omega Ruby: Despite their elegant appearance, they can flap their wings strongly and fly for thousands of miles.
Generation VI.Alpha Sapphire: Swanna start to dance at dusk. The one dancing in the middle is the leader of the flock.

Generation IX.Scarlet: Centered around its leader, the flock dances in perfect sync to strengthen its unity.
Generation IX.Violet: It's said that many artists have taken inspiration from the sight of Swanna performing a beautiful dance in the light of dawn.
